1.First of all, please check the phone number of the input is correct, if overdue bills. \n\n 2.Second, check the security software in the mobile phone whether to intercept the SMS, authentication code, please look for the 【cool la-la-la network】。\n\n 3.If the above methods are not, please try restart the phone 。\n\n
Guangdong cool network technology co., LTD. Is "cloud control" the first car networking platform operators, focus on provide cloud services for all kinds of car networking products, mainly include: car networking technology industry solutions, to provide large data mining and analysis services, custom App application, etc 。\n\n Among them, cool cloud platform (hereinafter referred to as "cool" cloud) series products are our company cooperate with the famous vehicle electronic equipment manufacturers to develop, based on "cloud car networking control", "auto CANBUS bus data fetching" core technology. For the majority of owners to provide intelligent, convenient and safe driving experience 。\n\n Cool! Cool ring (hereinafter referred to as "cool friends circle") for the majority of owners to provide dedicated to exchange platform service, member of the implementation to the car, driving fun, advocating more fashion, more intimate, more qualitative smart car life 。\n\n "Union world, intelligence control in the future!" Set sail, cool driving tour ！\n\n More surprises please attention Cool WeChat public number :kaichangkeji
Respect of customer, thank you for using cool utility vehicle networking platform (hereinafter referred to as: cool!), in the cool APP before, please read carefully and comply with the following provisions: \n\n Agreement text includes the services you use and its related terms, if you have any additional subsequent agreement, and you chose the additional services, this additional agreement should be as part of the agreement. Cool la-la-la multi-function car networking platform interconnected system (hereinafter referred to as \"cool!\") related software and services related to the contents of all by the guangdong cool! Network technology co., LTD. (hereinafter referred to as \"cool! The company\"). \n\n 1. The service content \n 1.1 Cool services including car terminal software and cool, company website and operation related to it operations center; , both in the performance form, the terminal software and is used with a variety of software and services 。\n 1.2 Cool! Now offer services including but not limited to the following content ：\n 1.2.1 Vehicle testing services, such as vehicle physical examination, scoring; The fault information query, proposals, cars remind, etc.; \n 1.2.2 The maintenance service, such as: recommended maintenance tips, maintenance supplies, maintenance/repair station recommended, make an appointment to repair/maintenance, etc; \n 1.2.3 Driving directions, such as driving habits, consumption statistics, illegal query information, etc.; \n 1.2.4Vehicle control, for example: start the vehicle, open the trunk, fortification removal, etc.; \n 1.3 Cool services include changes in the late, will be cool! Official channels provided by the company to the public. \n 1.4http://www.91kulala.com for cool\'s official website, based on the Internet and mobile Internet will provide related services (hereinafter referred to as \"web services\"), if you want to completely get and appropriate use of the network services, such as please follow the tips in the web page to finish all the registration procedures. \n\n
2. Open condition \n 2.1 You need to purchase in advance the original cool company intelligent vehicle terminal, and the terminal installed on your vehicle. \n 2.2 When you check in web site registration process for service agreement I agree and complete the account registration and related vehicle and terminal equipment certification process, all cool will open for you and provide cool, the companys services 。\n\n
3. Related charges and payment \n 3.1 Each vehicle terminal equipment to provide 1 year of cool company service free of charge, from the car terminal device to activate the same day. \n 3.1.1 During the service period, provide free cool company see cool company service on the website of the information. \n 3.2 You can choose according to your demand, free service period after the end of the package types. The specific content and charge standard package see cool company service on the website of the information. \n 3.3 In addition to the service period of free content, you can also choose to cool the value-added services company. Value-added services, opening time and the content of the charge standard see cool company service on the website of the information. \n 3.4 Other third parties to provide service charges (such as emergency rescue, on-site service provider or trailer company, etc.) and related web services related to systems (such as personal computers, mobile phones and other related to access to the Internet or mobile Internet device) the costs (such as pay for access to the Internet and telephone and Internet access, pay phone, etc.) for the use of mobile Internet, you need to burden on its own 。\n\n
4. Service changes, interrupt or stop \n 4.1 In order to ensure the cool novelty and practicability of the company, cool it will change in time, interrupt or stop network services. Such as change, interrupt or stop web services more than 24 hours, cool it will notice in advance before modification, interrupt or stop. \n 4.2 In order to ensure the quality of service, cool will from time to time to the network service platform or maintenance/repair and related equipment, thus reasonable cause service interruption, cool do not need to take any responsibility for this, but cool! Should be informed in advance as much as possible. \n 4.3If any of the following situations occurs, you will not be able to enjoy the cool! The company of all, or part of the corresponding service: \n 4.3.1 You submit personal information untrue, inaccurate, and related information; \n 4.3.2 You do not complete and appropriate rules for use of comply with the provisions of the provisions of this agreement. \n 4.3.3 You do not buy the original cool company intelligent vehicle terminal. \n\n
5. Using rules and relevant liability \n 5.1 You are cool after the success of the company website registration, cool! The company will generate your user account and password, the user account and password please safekeeping and for all behaviors and activities of this account bear corresponding responsibility. \n 5.2 In order to ensure you are able to fully and effectively enjoy cool company service, cool require you to provide accurate personal information, if there is any change in personal information, should be updated in a timely manner. \n 5.3 To ensure the security of your account, you should not to transfer account, password, or lend to others. If you find account illegally used by others, shall be notified immediately to cool. Caused by negligence leading to account, password hacking or keeping illegally used by others, cool it will fully assist you disable or restore the account, but cool! Do not have to be responsible for the theft, misuse, such as 。 \n 5.4 Once you order and/or use of the service, it indicates that you have agreed to you or your vehicle of all data provided to us free of charge, and authorize us to use your relevant information, including but not limited to the following conditions: \n 5.4.1 To you and your vehicle or your vehicle management agencies provide all services ；\n 5.4.2 Is your account and contact you ；\n 5.4.3 Check or maintain your cool company terminal equipment ；\n 5.4.4 Evaluate and continuously improve our service ；\n 5.4.5 Cooperate with you or other agreement parties perform the service agreement ；\n 5.4.6 To prevent fraud or improper use of the service ；\n 5.4.7 Comply with the legal provisions of the state, including has come into force may be involved in criminal investigation of a court order ；\n 5.4.8 Protecting the rights of you or other parties, property or safety ；\n 5.4.9 Provide you with a new or additional products or services ；\n 5.4.10 Cool! The company all send to you by relevant commercial advertising, sales promotion information or business information such as service data ；\n 5.4.11 For the development of products or improve the quality of the market and customer investigation 。\n 5.5 You promised to legally use cool to provide all the services, and in the process of using Internet comply with the relevant laws and regulations 。\n 5.6 In order to guarantee the legitimacy of our service and quality, cool! Company to cool network service of audit and supervision, including but not limited to released to you on the cool la-la-la company, checking the contents of storage, such as when you are using web services in violation of regulations, cool it will take the necessary measures to alleviate the influence caused by improper behavior 。\n 5.7 Cool it will take including but not limited to web announcement, Email, SMS alerts, to cool company service to modify or supplement, etc, to make a statement, notification, warning, etc., are considered to be part of this agreement, if you do not agree with, can press this agreement to provide contact information contact cool! And stop using cool company service, if you continue to use the cool company service, as you agree to the content of such statement, notification, warning 。\n 5.8 You understand and agree that, cool company system of GPS positioning results will provide positioning service for the pilot, will not be used for other USES. Cool! The company in the system is only for the driver reference GPS positioning results. If the abnormal situation, please refer to our actual vehicle driving road conditions 。\n 5.9 You understand and agree that, cool company locate in location data provided by the system, provide a general reference only, not promises to provide high precision positioning and planning path. Provided in positioning system (GPS) information is only for the driver reference, the final judgment will be subject to the local traffic rules. \ n
Besides the above items, such as has not obtained prior consent of the user, cool! Will not use the user privacy information for any other purposes. \n 5.10 You understand and agree that any improper use cool! The company service the risk will be fully borne by you personally 。\n 5.11Features provided by the cool, because of the different models you are different, the factory or installation instructions shall prevail 。\n 5.12A moving vehicle or special circumstances, please do not operate in strict accordance with the norms of operation, safe use, such as the consequences of irregularities, cool company does not undertake any responsibility 。\n 5.13In use process, if there is any need to please to cool now officially designated after-sales maintenance of after-sales service points or seek official for after-sales maintenance technician, not cool official any tear open outfit, modification, the consequences of cool company does not undertake any responsibility 。\n 5.14 Cool! Company to cool the product have the final explanation right 。\n\n
6. The applicable law and on the solution of the dispute \n\n This agreement to follow the law and subject to the jurisdiction of the Peoples Republic of China 。\n\n Related to this agreement any dispute, both sides should be friendly consultation in the first place, if no settlement is reached, the dispute will be submitted to guangzhou arbitration commission for arbitration, the decision of the arbitration will be final and binding upon both parties. Arbitration of all charges will be borne by the guilty party. \n Set card can do ？\nCan get exclusive badge, in cool friends circle posts have their own identity, highlight the noble identity; Can use their own personality dress up accessories 。\n\n2、How to get a card ？\nEvery login random get treasure box, treasure box is divided into wooden treasure box a golden, silver treasure box, box, sapphire treasure chest, purple drill treasure box, can get the corresponding card, the more noble card rates appear smaller, can through synthetic corresponding higher levels of CARDS 。\nOfficial irregular activities can obtain corresponding card, speed up to get the supreme card 。\n\n3、What is the difference between different treasure chest ？\nWooden treasure box a golden, silver treasure box, box, sapphire treasure chest, purple drill treasure case corresponding to the card as follows: primary, intermediate, advanced, luxurious card, costly. Ultimate card is extremely rare to pass the treasure chest, only by synthesis 。\n\n4、How many supreme card ？\nUltimate card collection, infinity can continue to collect, after getting a supreme badges will be more advanced 。
一、Play cool every day services, can get the integral, integral and service types and clinch a deal amount is related to, play can be the following business integration ：\n \n 1、Improve the basic information for user information \n Set the birthday +10\n Binding email +10\n Set the security question +20\n Set head +20\n Set the gender +10\n Set a Nickname+5\n Set up area +5\n Set the individuality signature +5\n More users center make integral style is online \n 2、登陆\n Log in every day +5\n Every seven days landed +20\n 3、Top-up consumption\n +10Integral/yuan, every top + 100 points。\n 4、Use cool service \n Every day for the first time open the function or application\n Deputy owner management +1\n State records +1\n Electronic fence +1\n Parking trajectory +1\n information +1\n Personality is dressed up +1\n Collection of card game +1\n \n 二、每日做任务赚积分\n Click on the [found] - [points] - to participate in the daily task 】 【 earning integral task \n The daily login + 5 \n Share the APP to WeChat friends, friends + 20 \n Launch vehicle + 5 \n Download the car skin +5\n Look at the card +5\n Integral cannot change now \n
